nodes.text: X-Wing was a painting depicting the eponymous starfighter utilized by the Alliance to Restore the Republic. The painting depicted a X-wing starfighter taking part in a space battle against several TIE/LN starfighters, with an MC30c frigate and a EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigate in the background.

The painting X-Wing, alongside the paintings Imperial Star Destroyer and KSE Firespray, was one of three bonus paintings that was unlockable as a result of players accessing Star Wars Galaxies after the "Double Everything Weekend" event on the last days of The Empire Strike's Back 30th Anniversary Celebration. Accessing Galaxies after the Double Everything Weekend resulted in a painting container that contained in random one of the three above paintings, and could be opened using the radial menu.
